Main Street Urbana, IL 61801 Phone: 217 333 7824 Email: mitras AT illinois dot edu Administrative Assistant Diana Scott Office: CSL 251, MC-228 Email: dlscott AT illinois dot edu Phone: 217 244 7171 Sayan Mitra [CV] Professor, Electrical and Computer Engineering Affiliate Professor, Computer Science Associate Director, Center for Autonomy University of Illinois at Urbana Champaign. Research. Safe autonomy (e.g., self-driving cars, spacecraft, and drones), formal methods, distributed systems, programming languages, robotics. Biosketch Sayan is a Professor and John Bardeen Faculty Scholar of ECE at UIUC. His research is on autonomy spanning theory and systems. Sayan received his PhD from MIT with Nancy Lynch. He wrote a textbook on verification of cyber-physical systems (MIT Press 2021). The group's work has been recognized with NSF CAREER Award, AFOSR Young Investigator Research Program Award, IEEE-HKN C. Holmes MacDonald Outstanding Teaching Award (2013), and several best paper awards. Want to join our group?
